requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Newer
  • Processor: i5 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 970 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct-X Compatible
  • VR Support: N/A
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i7 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1050ti 6GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct-X Compatible
  • VR Support: N/A
